page.title: 02PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: Here are some names of the games children play at school:hopscotch,football,netball,tip, British bulldogs,fox and hounds,hide and seek,catch a girl and kiss a girl,skipping,super heroes,may I?,piggy back fights and toy fighting. British bulldogs is a game where somebody is on and everybody else has to run from one end of the yard to the other end of the yard without being caught.Any number of children can play.If you are caught you are on with the person that caught you.The game carries on until the last person is caught.When the last person has been caught the game starts again.The first person caught is catcher in the next game.
